profileSummary: B.Tech Electronics and Communication Engineering student at Heritage Institute of Technology with a strong foundation in Java, SQL, and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP). Skilled in writing clean, maintainable code with strong problem-solving abilities. Continuously improving technical skills through hands-on projects and internships.

projects.name: Excel Analytics Platform
description: Built React-based platform for Excel upload, parsing, and visualization.
Created frontend with React.js using reusable components and Hooks.
Integrated SheetJS and REST APIs for dynamic data handling.

projects.name: Weather App
description: Developed a responsive weather application using React.js for UI, Tailwind CSS for styling, and integrated wttr.in API to fetch and display real-time weather data.
Implemented features such as city-based search, live weather updates, and a clean, mobile-friendly interface.

projects.tagline: A smart appointment and queue management system for seamless bookings.
projects.description: SmartQueue is a web-based appointment and queue management system designed to simplify service booking for users and optimize queue handling for service providers. Users can create an account, book appointments anytime, and automatically receive an estimated waiting time based on the real-time queue. Service providers can manage queues efficiently, update customer status, and ensure a smooth flow. The system also sends email notifications when the user's turn arrives.

userFeatures: User authentication with account creation and login
Option to register as a normal user or service provider
Book appointments at any time with automatic queue placement
Real-time tracking of estimated waiting time and position in the queue
Email notification when the user's turn comes
serviceProviderFeatures: Register as a service provider and manage queues
View and manage all appointments in real time
Automatic queue adjustments when a booking is canceled or completed
automation: Automatic calculation of estimated waiting time
Real-time sync between user and provider dashboards

highlights: Automatic appointment scheduling based on availability
Email alerts for users when their turn comes
User-friendly interface with a responsive design
Seamless integration between user and provider dashboards
futureScope: Integrate payment gateway for paid appointments
Add push notifications for better user engagement
Develop a mobile app version for iOS and Android

projects.name: 3D_Solar_System
projects.description: An interactive 3D model of the solar system built using Three.js and WebGL. Users can explore planets, moons, and other celestial bodies in a visually immersive environment.

projects.tagline: A real-time collaborative code editor with built-in chat and multi-language support.
projects.description: CollabCode Editor is a real-time collaborative coding platform where multiple users can join virtual rooms, write and edit code together, and run programs in multiple languages using the Judge0 API. It also features an integrated chat system and live participant tracking, making it ideal for pair programming, coding interviews, or group learning sessions.

userFeatures: Join or create coding rooms with unique room IDs
Real-time collaborative code editing with live synchronization
Integrated chat system for seamless communication
Switch between light and dark themes
Live participant list with join/leave notifications
collaborationFeatures: Real-time editor updates shared across all participants
Cursor tracking and typing indicators for better collaboration
Room persistence with stored code and language preferences
Automatic participant updates when users join or leave
automation: Code execution via Judge0 API with instant output
Automatic sync of programming language across participants

highlights: Persistent rooms with saved code and language state
futureScope: Add code versioning and history tracking

description: Worked in a team of 4 to develop an Excel Analytics Platform that enables users to upload and analyze Excel files.
Contributed primarily to the React.js frontend, implementing interactive dashboards, data visualization components, and a responsive UI.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate REST APIs and ensure seamless data flow between frontend and backend.
